message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $11,500. I think you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This is a very competitive price for a product of this value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Can you consider that?
